Redis - Memcache on Steroids!

Redis - Redis is an open source, BSD licensed, advanced key-value store. Simple. I wouldn't bother you too much. Think about it as Memcached on steroids. Redis is 'insanely fast.' - RAM is cheap these days. I've heard so many good things about this awesome systems, untill last two weeks...
